snippet: The Girl Scout cookie box is getting a major makeover to better tell the story of what girls learn from selling cookies.
abstract: Advertising column on the Girl Scout cookie box, which is getting a major makeover to better explain what girls learn from selling cookies as well as to reconnect with some of the 59 million Girl Scout alumnae.
lead_paragraph: The Girl Scout cookie box is getting a major makeover to better tell the story of what girls learn from selling cookies.

headline.main: Girl Scouts Update Recipe for Cookie Box
headline.print_headline: Girl Scouts Update Recipe For Cookie Box
